text: National Highway 77 is a National Highway of India entirely within the state of Bihar that links Hajipur to Sonbarsa near India-Nepal border, and is long. Length of National Highways-source-National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) == See also == * National Highway * List of National Highways * National Highways Development Project The National Highway has very important from commercial Point view as it connects North Bihar with South Bihar. It also important because it directly connects south Bihar with the International Border of Nepal. == References == 77 Category:National highways in India (old numbering)
title: National Highway 77 (India, old numbering)
